Hello, we are trying to create an autoalign code for our robot and to do so we have an array of all of our poses and we want to try to flip them for when we are on the red alliance side. However when we tested this code out it was working great on the blue alliance side but the poses were all messed up on the red alliance side.

this is our class to do it:

Thank you!
